Author: hetleyx
Text: Thank you so much. That’s actually reassuring. I’m terrified it won’t go down that much so this really helps. Thank you. :)

Author: miamyamae
Text: If it’s any consolation, your body probably wouldn’t have absorbed all the calories from all the food if it was in a high volume as a) if you hadn’t eaten like this recently before the binge then it wouldn’t be producing enough enyzmes and b) the thermic effect of a high calorie binge does mean that you do use a lot of calories actually digesting all that food. I hope things get easier for you ❤️
